jd: From: rajkumar, NITYA Software Solutions Inc. rajkumar.v@nityainc.com Reply to: rajkumar.v@nityainc.com Hi,I hope you are doing well.I am Raj from NITYA Software Solutions Inc.I've included below the job description, please let me know if you are interested, and reply with one updated resume, which I've expected.Role: ServiceNow ITSM Business Analyst Gathering, analyzing, and documenting business requirements from stakeholdersTranslating requirements into comprehensive documentsCollaborating with Product Owners, Scrum Masters, and Developers/AdminsProviding high-performance output of business requirement documentationMaintaining alignment with Product Owners and Scrum MastersLeading translation of business intake requests into requirements documentsCollaborating with customers to define process flow diagrams and use-case detailsServing as the point of contact for ServiceNow requestsProviding regular updates to stakeholdersBuilding understanding of ServiceNow usage by external customers and internal ITSM Product teamsDelivering robust acceptance criteriaSupporting unit testing, creation of test scripts, and facilitating Demos and User Acceptance TestingThank you,RajkumarEMAIL ID:rajkumar.v@nityainc.comNITYA Software Solutions Inc.
